__TOC__


Ubuntu Artwork team comprises of members from all around the world. 

Though the main language of communication on the mailing list and wiki is English, we realize English might not be the language of comfort for others worldwide.

==== Local contacts ====

If you find interacting, in English, with the rest of the team is hindering you from actively participating in Ubuntu Artwork, feel free to contact your local contact.

==== Being a local contact ====

Interested in helping out a fellow artist/designer?
* Feel free to add your yourself to the table above and be a local contact for a fellow artist. Help them understand the artwork tasks and specifications better.
* If you're fluent in more than one language, add one language per line.
